meanings.definition: A chewy confection made of sugar or honey, nuts, and egg white.
meanings.sent1: The nougat was sweet and sticky.
meanings.sent2: I bought a nougat bar at the store.
meanings.sent3: The nougat stretched like taffy when pulled.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as soft as nougat.
meanings.sent5: The nougat melted in my mouth like a sugary cloud.

meanings.definition: A type of candy bar containing nougat.
meanings.sent1: The nougat in the candy bar was delicious.
meanings.sent2: I love the nougat layer in this chocolate bar.
meanings.sent3: The nougat in the candy bar was like a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: The nougat added a layer of sweetness to the chocolate bar.
meanings.sent5: The nougat in the candy bar was a delightful surprise in every bite.
